remarks: The zero scalar of the closed kernel dual of a vector space. (Contributed by NM, 20-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcd0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcd0.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcd0.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcd0.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` F ) $.
lcd0.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcd0.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` C ) $.
lcd0.o $e |- O = ( 0g ` S ) $.
lcd0.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcd0 $p |- ( ph -> O = .0. ) $.
